properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 3:37AM EST until January 7 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY and Peconic and Gardiners Bays.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST TUESDAY
